page.title: 08BARNSTON SCHOOL MENU
page.content:
All children stay at school for lunch. 31% have a standard meal,23% a mini meal and 46% bring sandwiches.
A TYPICAL MENU OVER 2 DAYS MIGHT BE { Standard meal Mini Meal {MONDAY Cheese and egg flan, Small portion chips or potato, of cheese and beans,or spaghetti: egg flan,chips: Instant whip or Jam tart: cookie:Orange drink. Orange drink. {TUESDAY Minced beef pie, Sausage roll or potatoes or chips, beefburger, cabbage,gravy: chips and beans Creamy whirl biscuits: Jam tart or Milkshake. sponge:Water. { {The children's favourite meal is {beefburger and chips followed by ice {cream. }
